metadata.Title: CVE-2023-0795 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - medium.
metadata.Description:
LibTIFF 4.4.0 has an out-of-bounds read in tiffcrop in tools/tiffcrop.c:3488, allowing attackers to cause a denial-of-service via a crafted tiff file. For users that compile libtiff from sources, the fix is available with commit afaabc3e.

Update Instructions:

Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2023-0795` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
by updating your system to the following package versions:

libtiff-opengl - 4.1.0+git191117-2ubuntu0.20.04.8
libtiff-tools - 4.1.0+git191117-2ubuntu0.20.04.8
libtiff5 - 4.1.0+git191117-2ubuntu0.20.04.8
libtiffxx5 - 4.1.0+git191117-2ubuntu0.20.04.8
No subscription required

criterions.comment: tiff package in focal was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '4.1.0+git191117-2ubuntu0.20.04.8').
